item.title: Special Attack Class
item.dc:creator: @lawl lawl
item.description:
@lawl wrote:

the problem with posting it here is that most people are not familiar with anything private server related so regardless of the java experience of users here, you are unlikely to get any assistance

one thing i can tell you however is that having a ‘return false;’ in the middle of a method will give you an error… you probably meant to place it inside the if

item.title: Special Attack Class
item.dc:creator: @dogzound5 dogzound5@gmail.com
item.description:
@dogzound5 wrote:

If anyone is familiar with Runescape Private Server coding…

Ok, I am making a special attack class for Alpha8 source. If someone could take a look and tell me if I am on the right track that would great and if(I am not getting this right lol) {
point me in the right direction. Smiley All help is appreciated.

[code]package com.rs.worldserver.content.skill;

import com.rs.worldserver.events.Event;
import com.rs.worldserver.events.EventContainer;
import com.rs.worldserver.events.EventManager;
import com.rs.worldserver.model.player.Client;

public class SpecialAttack extends Attack {

public static boolean specialAttack(){
	int specialAttack = 100;
	if(specialAttack < 10) {
		System.out.println("Special Attack is degenerated.");
	}
	return false;
	
	if(player.ATTACK) {
		player.setBusy(true);
		player.getActionAssistant().startAnimation();
		player.getActionAssistant().turnTo(x, y);
		
	}
	
}

}
[/code]

Read full topic
